document_data.name: House Korianthil
document_data.History: In [[1367 DR]], it was led by the experienced [[war wizard]] [[Hatharal Korianthil]]. It specialized in the training of [[dog]]s, [[hawk]]s, and [[horse]]s. Prior to the [[Retreat]], the animals it trained were considered to be the finest in [[Faer√ªn]].
